Package paintingcanvas.painter

Class App.Ellipse

java.lang.Object
paintingcanvas.painter.App.SimpleElement<App.Ellipse>
paintingcanvas.painter.App.Ellipse
Enclosing class:
App
protected static class App.Ellipse extends App.SimpleElement<App.Ellipse>
An ellipse element. 

 // Create a new ellipse at (100, 100) with width 20 and height 30
 Ellipse ellipse = new Ellipse(100, 100, 20, 30);

    • Ellipse

      public Ellipse(int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Create a new Ellipse element. 
      
 // Create a new ellipse at (100, 100) with width 20 and height 30
 Ellipse ellipse = new Ellipse(100, 100, 20, 30);
      Parameters:
      x - The X-position of the ellipse
      y - The Y-position of the ellipse
      w - The width of the ellipse
      h - The height of the ellipse
